Package javelin.model.unit.condition

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Breathless  
    Charging  
    Condition
    A condition is a temporary effect on a Combatant.
    Defending  
    Dominated  
    Exhausted
    Moves at half speed and takes a -6 penalty to Strength and Dexterity.
    Fatigued
    A fatigued character can neither run nor charge and takes a -2 penalty to Strength and Dexterity.
    Heroic  
    Melding  
    Paralyzed  
    Poisoned
    A poisoned unit takes a certain amount of constitution damage immediately and a secondary amount after a short while.
    Prone  
    Shaken  
    Sickened
    TODO should affect ability checks, better left for when these are enum-based and easier to add a "ability obnus" for ability checks in specific (not ability scores!)
    Stunned  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Condition.Effect
    Buff means an effect is benefitial while debuff means it's a penalty.
